dress_designs.fabric: Lightweight silk chiffon overlay with a breathable crepe de chine lining
dress_designs.fit: Cinched at the natural waist with a self-tie silk belt to highlight the hourglass figure
dress_designs.image_generation_prompt: High-end fashion editorial photography of an elegant woman with a medium warm skin tone wearing a tea-length sage green silk chiffon wrap dress. The dress features delicate tonal botanical embroidery and soft flutter sleeves. The silhouette perfectly defines an hourglass shape with a cinched waist. Lighting is soft, diffused spring morning sunlight in a lush botanical garden. Photographed with a Sony A7R IV, 85mm lens, f/1.8, bokeh background of cherry blossoms. Textures of the silk are visible and airy.
dress_designs.length: Tea-length, hitting mid-calf for a sophisticated wedding guest look
dress_designs.neckline: Surplice V-neckline to elongate the neck and complement the oval face shape
dress_designs.pattern_details: Subtle tonal botanical embroidery along the hem and cuffs
dress_designs.silhouette: Structured wrap style that emphasizes the narrow waist and balances the bust and hips
dress_designs.sleeves: Sheer elbow-length flutter sleeves for a soft spring aesthetic

dress_designs.fabric: Mid-weight luxury viscose-satin with a subtle sheen and beautiful drape
dress_designs.fit: Body-skimming fit that contours the hips without being restrictive
dress_designs.image_generation_prompt: Full body shot of a professional fashion model with an oval face and warm medium skin, wearing a sophisticated taupe satin midi dress. The design features an elegant boat neckline and asymmetrical pleated waist detailing that highlights an hourglass figure. Studio lighting with a soft rim light to accentuate the fabric's sheen. The background is a clean, minimalist architectural space. 8k resolution, cinematic lighting, ultra-detailed fabric texture.
dress_designs.length: Midi length, finishing just below the knee
dress_designs.neckline: Boat neckline (Bateau) to provide a balanced frame for the oval face and medium shoulders
dress_designs.pattern_details: Asymmetrical pleating at the waist gathering into a side knot feature
dress_designs.silhouette: Tailored sheath with strategic draping across the bodice to celebrate hourglass curves
dress_designs.sleeves: Sleek sleeveless design with slightly wider straps for undergarment support

dress_designs.fabric: Cotton-silk blend jacquard with a subtle raised floral texture
dress_designs.fit: Structured bodice with a flexible internal boning for a perfect hourglass fit
dress_designs.image_generation_prompt: Elegant wedding guest attire. A woman with an oval face and warm medium complexion in a structured fit-and-flare midi dress made of warm slate-colored jacquard. The dress has a sweetheart neckline and capped lace sleeves. The fabric features a rich, embossed floral texture. Captured in a sun-drenched historic courtyard during golden hour. Professional fashion photography, deep depth of field, vibrant but natural colors, 35mm film aesthetic.

recommended_categories: Floral Chiffon Maxi with Cinched Waist
Tailored Wide-Leg Jumpsuit with Waist Tie
styling_tips: Highlight your hourglass silhouette by ensuring the waist is always defined; avoid shift dresses or oversized silhouettes that hide your proportions.
Leverage your oval face shape by experimenting with diverse necklines, particularly V-necks or sweetheart necklines which add to an elegant, feminine aesthetic.
Choose gold-toned jewelry and accessories rather than silver to harmonize with your warm undertones and enhance your natural glow.
Select light, breathable fabrics like silk, chiffon, or high-quality crepe to suit the spring weather while maintaining a sophisticated wedding guest look.
